title: Border, 2010-31-39, 1928–1929
provenance: Donor purchased the two Grantil sample books from a private collector in France ca. 2000. For the remaining non-Grantil pieces, the French, Belgian and English papers were acquired from various sources in Europe, while the American samples were acquired from private collections in the United States.
description: Collection of round fruit in solid colors of green, orange, and yellow. Behind the fruit is a collection of small burgundy leaves from which thin braches curl out, with some leaves attaches. The top border is several green, brown and white stripes with alternating squares of orange and white. An orange strip acts as the bottom border. The background is off-white. The paper is pebble embossed.
